title: Very good and clean museum
text: We had a short time before they closed but it was ok. Lots of things to see and we liked it very much.

title: Very nice and very good restaurant
text:

Most wonderful spot in this area and the view, omg.

title: Must go there
text:

title: Very good pizza
text: Very good and large pizza. Service was friendly and the place had a good and clean space. Thank you for a nice dinner.

title: Great staff
text:
We came for familydinner and most of us had the menu of the night.
The staff was very frendly and the fodd was good especially the starters and dessert.

title: One of our favorits
text: very nice restaurant, with best view, best service and great food. We had pizza, snitchel, chicken, pasta and lots of cocktails. Vety nice for kids

title: Nice
text: Nice ride but most of the time was standing in line, even thoug we had fast track tickets. If you want to see more we recoment The Shard where you can see from the 72th floor.

title: Sinfonia very nice and clean
text:
Sinfonia is very nice and clean place to sit down and have a lovely dinner.
We had, chiken fahitas, buritos, salmon and ribs.
Everything was very good and exilant service.

title: Nice place
text:
To sit down after 18 holes Ã¡t UNIK cafe is very nice. Little expensive but nice.
We eat lunch and dinner and it was very good. Service is much better now.

title: Best golfcourse in Spain
text:
We was here for a week and we loved it.
Staff was very friendly and good service. The Golfcourse is the best we have visit and we will be back.
Thank you very much for everyhing.

title: Best sushi
text:
We got a very good sushi in Enso Sushibar at Las Colinas and we will be back.
Service was very good and we got mixed sushi from the chef and very good white house vine.

title: Very nice place
text:
It's a very nice and quiet place to relaxing but the pool is very cold.

title: Very good fillet steak
text:
Very good fillet steak with mushroom saus and baked potato.
We loved the food, vine and service.
We will be back
